医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
超加工食品与失眠风险有关据估计，超加工食品（UPF）可能与三分之一成年人的失眠有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240601/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-insomnia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240601/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-insomnia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a865ffe6-4c27-4a64-ad53-f0abcbe09808 Sat, 01 Jun 2024 20:50:32 -0400 Ultra-processed foods linked to insomnia risk
新方法增强双特异性抗体疗法治疗实体瘤的功效浦项科技大学 (POSTECH) 生命科学系的 Seung-Woo Lee 教授和博士生 Kun-Joo Lee 与 NeoImmuneTech 主任 Donghoon Choi 以及江原国立大学的 Dae Hee Kim 和 Sun Shim Choi 教授合作，揭示了一种突破性的方法，可以显着增强双特异性抗体疗法治疗实体瘤的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/New-method-enhances-the-efficacy-of-bispecial-antibody-therapies-in-treating-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/New-method-enhances-the-efficacy-of-bispecial-antibody-therapies-in-treating-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27fcc4c0-e8d1-4b8a-ad98-5b0232f61d7a Fri, 31 May 2024 11:15:00 -0400 New method enhances the efficacy of bispecific antibody therapies in treating solid tumors
放射组学成像分析可有效预测前庭神经鞘瘤患者的听力状况最近的一项研究表明，放射组学成像分析可以有效预测前庭神经鞘瘤患者的听力状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Radiomics-imaging-analysis-can- effectively-forecast-hearing-status-of-vestibular-schwannoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Radiomics-imaging-analysis-can- effectively-forecast-hearing-status-of-vestibular-schwannoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1ab2b28-a16d-4add-aad5-7dcf01540bff Fri, 31 May 2024 11:06:00 -0400 Radiomics imaging analysis can effectively forecast hearing status of vestibular schwannoma patients
TMPRSS2 蛋白促进 SARS-CoV-2 通过意想不到的途径进入Sars-Cov-2 颗粒究竟如何进入宿主细胞？由德国波鸿鲁尔大学分子和医学病毒学系 Daniel Todt 博士计算病毒学小组的 Richard Brown 博士领导的国际团队与保罗·埃利希研究所的研究人员一起研究了这个问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/TMPRSS2- Protein-facilitates-SARS-CoV-2-entry-via-unexpected-pathway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/TMPRSS2- Protein-facilitates-SARS-CoV-2-entry-via-unexpected-pathway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ddc4453-9f0b-47c9-bb51-f0dd9d83f376 Fri, 31 May 2024 10:59:00 -0400 TMPRSS2 protein facilitates SARS-CoV-2 entry via unexpected pathway
新研究中心深入研究泛素在癌症中的作用德国研究基金会 (DFG) 现已批准成立一个新的合作研究中心，以寻找创新的癌症疗法：来自慕尼黑工业大学 (TUM)、法兰克福歌德大学和维尔茨堡朱利叶斯马克西米利安大学 (JMU) 的研究人员已加入为此目的的力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/New-research-center-delves-into-ubiquitins-role-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/New-research-center-delves-into-ubiquitins-role-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99072b56-a398-41b0-9e4c-bb9f944f767b Fri, 31 May 2024 10:50:00 -0400 New research center delves into ubiquitin's role in cancer
了解 SciY 如何为科学家赋能在本次采访中，NewsMedical 与 Santi Dominguez 讨论了 SCiY 的起源，以及该联盟打算如何为科学家和研究人员提供支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Discover-how-SciY-empowers-scientists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Discover-how-SciY-empowers-scientists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a42a696-5c91-47a1-9157-0719a535bedd Fri, 31 May 2024 10:47:00 -0400 Discover how SciY empowers scientists
新的移动应用程序在戒烟方面取得了巨大成功在芬兰奥卢大学研究人员的领导下开发的一款新的移动应用程序已被证明是对试图戒烟的长期吸烟者的有效帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/New-mobile-app-shows-dramatic-success-in-smoking-cessation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/New-mobile-app-shows-dramatic-success-in-smoking-cessation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60df0409-3b91-4f09-8c4e-e298b68a4601 Fri, 31 May 2024 10:42:00 -0400 New mobile app shows dramatic success in smoking cessation
有监督的体育锻炼可减轻背痛并改善老年护理人员的健康主要是老年和中年女性、工人阶级，腰痛发病率非常高，因此可能出现心理情感问题，生活质量较差……这是老年人照顾者的普遍概况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Supervised-physical-exercise-lowers-back-pain-and-improves-wellbeing-of-eldercare-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Supervised-physical-exercise-lowers-back-pain-and-improves-wellbeing-of-eldercare-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b55efc0-91c4-4226-ad5d-1d55b93ef641 Fri, 31 May 2024 10:35:00 -0400 Supervised physical exercise lowers back pain and improves wellbeing of eldercare workers
HEL 集团通过指定专业经销商扩大销售和支持HEL Group (HEL) 是一家用于流程优化、安全和放大的创新实验室工具的全球开发商和制造商，今天宣布扩大其全球销售网络，任命两家经销商：Paralab 和 ProAnalytics。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/HEL-Group-extends-sales-and-support-with-appointment-of-specialist-distributors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/HEL-Group-extends-sales-and-support-with-appointment-of-specialist-distributors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bf35f65-9663-479a-8847-43c3521569fb Fri, 31 May 2024 08:35:00 -0400 H.E.L Group extends sales and support with appointment of specialist distributors
生命要素 8：通过表观遗传学减少心脏病和死亡率的关键基于 DNA 甲基化的表观遗传年龄生物标志物是否介导 LE8 评分与 CVD 风险、CVD 特异性死亡率和全因死亡率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Lifes-Essential-8-key-to-reducing-heart-disease-and-mortality-through-epigenics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Lifes-Essential-8-key-to-reducing-heart-disease-and-mortality-through-epigenics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9561e965-12a9-4063-b4e6-f99b47a49eae Fri, 31 May 2024 08:34:00 -0400 Life's Essential 8: key to reducing heart disease and mortality through epigenetics
